hibernate-mapping.query: select distinct pd.name from org.jbpm.graph.def.ProcessDefinition pd
select count (distinct pd.name) from org.jbpm.graph.def.ProcessDefinition pd
select count (pi.id) from org.jbpm.graph.exe.ProcessInstance pi where pi.end is null
select pd from org.jbpm.graph.def.ProcessDefinition pd where pd.name = :name order by pd.version desc
select pd from org.jbpm.graph.def.ProcessDefinition pd where pd.name = :name and pd.version = :version
select pd from org.jbpm.graph.def.ProcessDefinition pd order by pd.name, pd.version desc
select pd from org.jbpm.graph.def.ProcessDefinition pd where pd.name = :name order by pd.version desc
select pd.name, max(pd.version) from org.jbpm.graph.def.ProcessDefinition pd group by pd.name
select pi from org.jbpm.graph.exe.ProcessInstance pi where pi.processDefinition.id = :processDefinitionId order by pi.start desc
select ps from org.jbpm.graph.node.ProcessState ps where ps.subProcessDefinition = :subProcessDefinition
select pi from org.jbpm.graph.exe.ProcessInstance pi where pi.processDefinition.name = :processDefinitionName and pi.end is null order by pi.start desc
select pi from org.jbpm.graph.exe.ProcessInstance pi where pi.processDefinition.name = :processDefinitionName order by pi.start desc
select pi from org.jbpm.graph.exe.ProcessInstance pi where pi.end is null order by pi.start desc
select pi from org.jbpm.graph.exe.ProcessInstance pi order by pi.start desc
select pi from org.jbpm.graph.exe.ProcessInstance pi where pi.superProcessToken is not null and pi.superProcessToken.processInstance = :processInstance order by pi.start desc
select token from org.jbpm.graph.exe.Token token where token.processInstance.processDefinition.name = :processDefinitionName and token.node.name = :nodeName

select token from org.jbpm.graph.exe.Token token where token.processInstance.processDefinition.name = :processDefinitionName and token.processInstance.processDefinition.version = :processDefinitionVersion and token.node.name = :nodeName
select pi from org.jbpm.graph.exe.ProcessInstance pi where pi.processDefinition = :processDefinition and pi.key = :key
select pl from org.jbpm.logging.log.ProcessLog pl where pl.token.processInstance = :processInstance
select ti from org.jbpm.taskmgmt.exe.TaskInstance ti where ti.processInstance = :processInstance
delete from org.jbpm.job.Job job where job.processInstance = :processInstance

select nl.node.id, nl.node.name, count(nl.leave), avg(nl.duration), min(nl.duration), max(nl.duration) from org.jbpm.graph.log.NodeLog nl where nl.node.processDefinition.id = :processDefinitionId and nl.duration > :minimumDuration group by nl.node.id, nl.node.name order by avg(nl.duration) desc
select node from org.jbpm.graph.exe.Token token join token.node node where token.processInstance = :processInstance and token.isSuspended = false and token.parent is not null and token.end is null
select distinct swimlane.name from org.jbpm.taskmgmt.def.Swimlane swimlane
select pl from org.jbpm.logging.log.ProcessLog pl where pl.token = :token order by pl.index
select job from org.jbpm.job.Job job where (job.lockOwner is null or job.lockOwner = :lockOwner) and job.retries > 0 and job.dueDate <= :now and job.isSuspended = false order by job.dueDate asc
select job from org.jbpm.job.Job job where job.lockOwner is null and job.retries > 0 and job.dueDate <= :now and job.isSuspended = false order by job.dueDate asc
select min(job.dueDate) from org.jbpm.job.Job job where job.dueDate <= :wakeUpDate and job.lockOwner is null and job.retries > 0 and job.isSuspended = false

select job from org.jbpm.job.Job job where (job.lockOwner is null or job.lockOwner = :lockOwner) and job.retries > 0 and job.dueDate <= :now and job.processInstance = :processInstance and job.isExclusive = true and job.isSuspended = false order by job.dueDate asc
update org.jbpm.job.Job job set job.isSuspended = true where job.token = :token
update org.jbpm.job.Job job set job.isSuspended = false where job.token = :token
delete from org.jbpm.job.Timer timer where timer.token = :token and timer.name = :name and timer.lockOwner is null
select timer from org.jbpm.job.Timer timer where timer.token = :token and timer.name = :name and timer.repeat is not null
select count(job.id) from org.jbpm.job.Job job where job.processInstance = :processInstance and job.lockOwner is null and job.class in (org.jbpm.job.ExecuteNodeJob, org.jbpm.job.Timer)
delete from org.jbpm.job.Job job where job.processInstance = :processInstance and job.lockOwner is null and job.class in (org.jbpm.job.ExecuteNodeJob, org.jbpm.job.Timer)
select timer from org.jbpm.job.Timer timer where timer.processInstance = :processInstance and timer.repeat is not null
select job from org.jbpm.job.Job as job where job.token = :token
select job from org.jbpm.job.Job job where job.lockTime < :threshold
select job from org.jbpm.job.Job job where (job.lockOwner is null or job.lockOwner = :lockOwner) and job.retries > 0 and job.isSuspended = false order by job.dueDate asc

select job from org.jbpm.job.Job job where (job.lockOwner is null or job.lockOwner = :lockOwner) and job.id not in (:monitoredJobIds) and job.retries > 0 and job.isSuspended = false order by job.dueDate asc
select job from org.jbpm.job.Job job where job.lockOwner is null and job.retries > 0 and job.isSuspended = false order by job.dueDate asc
select ti from org.jbpm.taskmgmt.exe.TaskInstance ti where ti.actorId = :actorId and ti.isSuspended = false and ti.isOpen = true
select ti from org.jbpm.taskmgmt.exe.TaskInstance ti where ti.actorId in (:actorIds) and ti.isSuspended = false and ti.isOpen = true

select distinct ti.id from org.jbpm.taskmgmt.exe.TaskInstance ti join ti.pooledActors pooledActor where pooledActor.actorId = :actorId and ti.actorId is null and ti.isSuspended = false and ti.isOpen = true

select distinct ti.id from org.jbpm.taskmgmt.exe.TaskInstance ti join ti.pooledActors pooledActor where pooledActor.actorId in (:actorIds) and ti.actorId is null and ti.isSuspended = false and ti.isOpen = true
select ti from org.jbpm.taskmgmt.exe.TaskInstance ti where ti.token.id = :tokenId and ti.isSuspended = false and ti.isOpen = true
select ti from org.jbpm.taskmgmt.exe.TaskInstance ti where ti.token.processInstance = :processInstance and ti.isSuspended = false and ti.isOpen = true
select ti from org.jbpm.taskmgmt.exe.TaskInstance ti where ti.id in (:taskInstanceIds)
select ti from org.jbpm.taskmgmt.exe.TaskInstance ti where ti.token.processInstance = :instance and ti.end is null
